name: blog-app
description: A modern blog application with Express.js backend and React frontend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter blog-backend build && pnpm --filter blog-frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter blog-backend test && pnpm --filter blog-frontend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter blog-backend lint && pnpm --filter blog-frontend lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter blog-backend type-check && pnpm --filter blog-frontend type-check
